abstract: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer plans to buy out Carl C. Icahn’s entire stake in the film studio for about $590 million, as preparation to eventually go public, a person briefed on the matter said on Tuesday.
snippet: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer plans to buy out Carl C. Icahn’s entire stake in the film studio for about $590 million, as preparation to eventually go public, a person briefed on the matter said on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer plans to buy out Carl C. Icahn‘s entire stake in the film studio for about $590 million, as preparation to eventually go public, a person briefed on the matter said on Tuesday.

headline.main: MGM Said to Plan a Buyout of Icahn’s Stake

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
